question: Bring out the wrong statements?
option1: Leo Tolstoy was one of the people who influenced Gandhi Ji very Much
option2: Religious and socials reforms contributed a lot to develop nationalism in India
option3: The main purpose of Crips Mission was to form constituent assembly
explanation:
Gandhiji received inspiration of nonviolence from the book "The Kingdom of God Is Within You" which was written by Leo Tolstoy (Russian writer and philosopher) in the year 1894.
Religious and socials reforms conducted by Raja Rammohan Roy, Swami Vivekananda, Vidyasagar contributed a lot to develop nationalism in India like abolition of Sati, Widow remarriage, womens education etc.
Cripps mission was headed by Stafford Cripps. It came to India in March 1942 to seek support of Indians in the event of World War II and in return they delivered constitutional proposals.
